it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.android.stepdetection

Class FasterStepDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.observer.AbstractEmitter<Step>
      • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.StepDetector
        • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.android.stepdetection.FasterStepDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Emitter<Step>, Observer<Acceleration>

    public class FasterStepDetector
extends StepDetector
implements Observer<Acceleration>
    This class is an Android implementation of Step Detection. I used this because the one in the Android Framework is too slow in its updates. Refers to https://github.com/bagilevi/android-pedometer (GNU GPL)
